dublin_core.dcvalue: The use of telemedicine to diagnose patients before they come to the ED may benefit the operation of your ED as well as the emergency medicine system in general Potential advantages include the following By identifying nonemergent cases it can help reduce overcrowding Since nonemergent patients have the longest wait times it may reduce rates for patients who leave without being seen and boost satisfaction It can help avoid unnecessary transfers to and from the ED
Made available in DSpace on 2020-02-10T17:27:30Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2006-10-16
ED management : the monthly update on emergency department management
Will new e-facility help fight ED overcrowding?
